Package com.innolabs.spydroid

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AntiTheftMailSenderService
    AntiTheft Mail Sender Service is a Service that sends the After Theft details to the user either by e-mail or SMS.
    AntiTheftPreferences
    Activity to show the Anti-Theft Preferences.
    AntiTheftService
    Anti Theft Service is a service to check for the theft of the device and return the result
    BootReceiver
    Boot Receiver is a class of Android Component type Broadcast Receiver which initiates on Receiving some Intent.
    CallListeners
    Call Listener Service is a service used to SPY the Call logs from the device.
    CurrentLocationOverlay
    Current Location Overlay is a class extending Itemized Overlay from Google Maps API which helps to add a custom icon or custom image on the Current location Marker on the Google Map
    DataBase
    DataBase is a generic class for the SQLite Database creation in Android and is used to access the SQLite Database features with parameters and making it as Generic for all Database access types in the Application
    LocationsListener
    Location Listener is a class used to listen or track the locations of the user and storing them to the database
    Mail
    Mail is a predefined class provided by Google to create a socket connection and send the mail using SMTP
    MainActivity
    Activity to display the main page of the application.
    MainService
    Main Service is a Android service to start all other Services of the application
    RegistrationDialog
    An alert dialog for user registration purpose.
    RootService
    Root Service is the main Service in Spy Droid Application which starts the Main Service which inturn starts all other Services
    SimChangeChecker
    Sim Changer Service is a class which has methods which checks for the Sim Change Activity and initiates the Anti Theft Service
    SMSListeners
    SMS Listener Service is a service used to SPY the SMS logs from the device.
    SplashActvity
    Activity used to show the Splash Screen.
    SpyDroidMailSenderService
    Spy Droid Mail Sender Service is a Service that sends the SPY data to the registrar either by e-mail or SMS.
    WriteDataBasetoXML
    Write DataBase to XML is a class which acts as a Service in the Application and helps in writing the spy data from the database to an XML file.
    XmlBuilder
    Xml Builder is a class which creates XML files of the SPY data by getting the logs from the Database in which the SPY data is stored.
